title: Challenger nidalee unavailable?
body: Does anyone know when she will be making a return? Her appearance was so short lived {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Hey Weapon In Hand - 

Challenger Nidalee is a legacy skin and makes periodic returns to the shop, most commonly at the beginning of the season.
Any chance she shows up again any time soon? Need her to complete nidalee skins ðŸ˜€
Looks like we haven't shared any details on the next time she's going to be available again, but she certainly will be in the store again!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KHFLrPvO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-03T18:40:39.858+0000)
>
> Hey Weapon In Hand - 
> 
> Challenger Nidalee is a legacy skin and makes periodic returns to the shop, most commonly at the beginning of the season.

THE GODS HAVE SPOKEN!!
Aw oh I'll be on the lookout thanks!
